NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUIFactory
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUIFactory
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​UIFactory
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​UIFactory
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​UIFactory

Universal interface for creating UI utilized by SparkleUpdater

Functions
CreateUpdateAvailableWindow
IUpdateAvailable CreateUpdateAvailableWindow(
SparkleUpdater sparkle,
List<AppCastItem> updates,
bool isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded = false
)

Create sparkle form implementation. This is the form that tells the user that an update is available, shows changelogs if necessary, etc.

Parameters
sparkle
SparkleUpdater

The SparkleUpdater instance to use

updates
List<AppCastItem>

Sorted array of updates from latest to previous

isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded
bool

If true, make sure UI text shows that the user is about to install the file instead of download it.

CreateProgressWindow
IDownloadProgress CreateProgressWindow(
AppCastItem item
)

Create the download progress window

Parameter
item
AppCastItem

Appcast item to download

ShowCheckingForUpdates
ICheckingForUpdates ShowCheckingForUpdates()

Inform user in some way that NetSparkle is checking for updates

Init
void Init()

Initialize UI. Called when Sparkle is constructed and/or when the UIFactory is set.

ShowUnknownInstallerFormatMessage
void ShowUnknownInstallerFormatMessage(
string downloadFileName
)

Show user a message saying downloaded update format is unknown

ShowVersionIsUpToDate
void ShowVersionIsUpToDate()

Show user that current installed version is up-to-date

ShowVersionIsSkippedByUserRequest
void ShowVersionIsSkippedByUserRequest()

Show message that latest update was skipped by user

ShowCannotDownloadAppcast
void ShowCannotDownloadAppcast(
string appcastUrl
)

Show message that appcast is not available

CanShowToastMessages
bool CanShowToastMessages()

See if this UIFactory can show toast messages

Returns

true if the UIFactory can show for toast messages; false otherwise

ShowToast
void ShowToast(
List<AppCastItem> updates,
Action<List<AppCastItem>> clickHandler
)

Show 'toast' window to notify new version is available

Parameters
updates
List<AppCastItem>

Appcast updates

clickHandler
Action<List<AppCastItem>>

handler for click

ShowDownloadErrorMessage
void ShowDownloadErrorMessage(
string message,
string appcastUrl
)

Show message on download error

Parameters
message
string

Error message from exception

appcastUrl
string

the URL for the appcast file

Shutdown
void Shutdown()

Shut down the UI so we can run an update.  If in WPF, System.Windows.Application.Current.Shutdown().  If in WinForms, Application.Exit().  If in Avalonia, shuts down the current application lifetime if it implements IClassicDesktopStyleApplicationLifetime.

Properties
HideReleaseNotes
bool HideReleaseNotes { get; set }

Hides the release notes view when an update is found.

HideSkipButton
bool HideSkipButton { get; set }

Hides the skip this update button when an update is found.

HideRemindMeLaterButton
bool HideRemindMeLaterButton { get; set }

Hides the remind me later button when an update is found.
